title: Gifting Event
body: So recently Riot Games announced that they will be giving away mystery gifts to everyone that has been active/played in the past month. Today my friend received his gift but I have not :/

replies.body: We're sending these gifts out in waves. If you don't have anything by tomorrow, the *23rd*, let me know.
The 10 year [gifts ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you)are being sent out in waves and you should get them by 9/23.
